code: export var required=function required(value){return value.trim()!=='';};export var length=function length(config){return function(value){var isValid=true;if(config.min){isValid=isValid&&value.trim().length>=config.min;}if(config.max){isValid=isValid&&value.trim().length<=config.max;}return isValid;};};export var email=function email(value){/[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+(?:\.[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)*@(?:[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?\.)+[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?/.test(value);};
